title: LINE app : quarterly revenue 2012 to 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion yen for 13 number of Quarters.
The maximum Revenue in billion yen 30.0 is found at Quarter Q4 '15 and the minimum is found at Q4 '12 where Quarter is 2.2.
The highest Quarter Q4 '15 has 27.8 more Revenue in billion yen than the lowest Quarter Q4 '12.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion yen for 13 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in billion yen is highest at Quarter Q4 '15 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '12.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion yen for 13 number of Quarters.
The maximum Revenue in billion yen 30.0 is found at Quarter Q4 '15 and the minimum is found at Q4 '12 where Quarter is 2.2.
The highest Quarter Q4 '15 has 27.8 more Revenue in billion yen than the lowest Quarter Q4 '12.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion yen in the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in billion yen 30.0 is found at Quarter Q4 '15 and the minimum is found at Q4 '12 where Quarter is 2.2.
The second highest Revenue in billion yen is appeared to be the Quarter Q3 '15.
The highest Quarter Q4 '15 has 27.8 more Revenue in billion yen than the lowest Quarter Q4 '12.
Revenue in billion yen at Quarter Q4 '15 is 30.0 , second place is Q3 '15 at 29.9, and thirdly is Q1 '15 at 25.4.
Overall Revenue in billion yen has decreased over the Quarters.
The highest value 30.0 at Q4 '15 is almost 1.74 times larger than the average value 17.22.
The Revenue in billion yen is 223.9 if we add up values of all Quarters.
